revised_title: Researches on Organo-Metallic Bodies: A New Series of Organic Acids Containing Nitrogen
tldr: Edward Frankland investigates the reaction of zincethyl and zincmethyl with binoxide of nitrogen, resulting in the formation of a new series of organic acids containing nitrogen. He explores the properties and reactions of these acids, including dinitroethylic acid and dinitromethylic acid, and their corresponding salts.
